data.title: Animal Crossing Hub
data.meta_description: Nintendo UK's official Animal Crossing hub, where you can find Animal Crossing games for Wii U and Nintendo 3DS family systems, including Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer and Animal Crossing: amiibo Festival.
data.text:
Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo

Nintendo 3DS

Starting from:

Take up the role of mayor and turn your town into a wonderful place to live. Settle into your new job with the help of your adorable assistant Isabelle, make friends with the villagers and change your town for the better!

Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer

Nintendo 3DS

Starting from:

Start a new job at Nook’s Homes and use your joy of home designing to transform the lives of your favourite Animal Crossing friends. Let your imagination run wild as you turn humble abodes into dream homes and beyond!

Animal Crossing: amiibo Festival

Wii U

Starting from:

Invite your friends to play a light-hearted board game filled with your favourite Animal Crossing pals. Use your amiibo to race around a board-game town where events change with the seasons – may the happiest player win!

Animal Crossing: Let's Go to the City

Wii

Starting from:

Take a break from the quiet life and discover a world beyond your town. In Animal Crossing: Let’s Go to the City, venture out into the city where you can shop til you drop, soak in the culture, and much more!

Animal Crossing: Wild World

Wii U

Starting from:

Venture out into the wild and discover a new town filled with animal friends. With Animal Crossing: Wild World, you’ll never miss out on a chance to hang out with the neighbours, create new memories, or simply unwind in your portable paradise.

Animal Crossing

Nintendo GameCube

Starting from:

Animal Crossing isn't like other videogames. Here you won't find monsters to smite, chasms to leap or even princesses to save - instead, an enchanting woodland setting offers the player a unique gaming experience.

What is Nintendo Switch?

Play your favourite games anytime, anywhere, with anyone, with Nintendo Switch. Experience home console gaming on the go and enjoy your games however and wherever you want.

What is Nintendo 3DS?

Nintendo 3DS family systems are handheld systems that let you game with Nintendo wherever you go, and there's a system to suit everybody!

What is Wii U?

Wii U is a home video game console with a unique controller, the Wii U GamePad, that you can enjoy alone or with friends and family.
